sourcesContent:
import * as React from 'react';
import {Button, View, Text, Dimensions, FlatList, Pressable, ScrollView, StyleSheet, TouchableOpacity} from 'react-native';


import {useNavigation, useRoute} from "@react-navigation/native";
import {useState} from "react";


export default function SearchScreen() {
    const navigation = useNavigation();
    const route = useRoute();

    const [theme, setTheme] = useState(9)
    const [number, setNumber] = useState(1)
    const [difficulty, setDifficulty] = useState("easy")

    return (
        <View style={styles.container}>
            <View style={styles.choice_container}>
                <Text style={styles.title}>Search Quiz</Text>

                <View style={styles.theme}>
                    <label>Select a theme</label>
                    <select name="theme" id="theme_choice" size={5}>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setTheme(9)}}>General Knowledge</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setTheme(10)}}>Books</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setTheme(11)}}>Film</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setTheme(12)}}>Music</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setTheme(13)}}>Musicals & Theatres</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setTheme(14)}}>Television</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setTheme(15)}}>Video Games</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setTheme(16)}}>Board Games</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setTheme(17)}}>Science & Nature</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setTheme(18)}}>Computer Sciences</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setTheme(19)}}>Mathematics</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setTheme(20)}}>Mythology</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setTheme(21)}}>Sports</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setTheme(22)}}>Geography</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setTheme(23)}}>History</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setTheme(24)}}>Politics</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setTheme(25)}}>Art</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setTheme(26)}}>Celebrities</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setTheme(27)}}>Animals</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setTheme(28)}}>Vehicles</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setTheme(29)}}>Comics</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setTheme(30)}}>Gadgets</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setTheme(31)}}>Anime & Manga</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setTheme(32)}}>Cartoon & Animations</option>
                    </select>
                </View>

                <View style={styles.number}>
                    <label>Select the number of questions</label>
                    <select name="numQuestion" size={5}>
                            <option onSelect={() => {setNumber(5)}}>5</option>
                            <option onSelect={() => {setNumber(10)}}>10</option>
                            <option onSelect={() => {setNumber(15)}}>15</option>
                            <option onSelect={() => {setNumber(20)}}>20</option>
                            <option onSelect={() => {setNumber(25)}}>25</option>
                            <option onSelect={() => {setNumber(30)}}>30</option>
                            <option onSelect={() => {setNumber(35)}}>35</option>
                            <option onSelect={() => {setNumber(40)}}>40</option>
                            <option onSelect={() => {setNumber(45)}}>45</option>
                            <option onSelect={() => {setNumber(50)}}>50</option>
                    </select>
                </View>

                <View style={styles.difficulty}>
                    <label>Select the difficulty</label>
                    <select name="difficulty" id="difficulty_choice">
                        <option onSelect={() => {setDifficulty('easy')}} value="easy">Easy</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setDifficulty('medium')}} value="medium">Medium</option>
                        <option onSelect={() => {setDifficulty('hard')}} value="hard">Hard</option>
                    </select>
                </View>

            </View>
            <View style={styles.button}>
                <Button title={"Search Quiz"} onPress={() => navigation.navigate('Quiz')}/>
            </View>
        </View>
    );
}

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
    container: {
        height: '100%',
        width: '100%',
        alignItems: "center"
    },

    choice_container: {
        display: "flex",
        flexDirection: "column",
        width: '80%'
    },

    title: {
        marginTop: 10,
        marginBottom: 30,
        textAlign: "center",
        fontSize: 20,
        fontWeight: "bold"
    },

    theme: {
        marginBottom: '20px'
    },

    number: {
        marginBottom: '20px'
    },

    difficulty: {

    },

    button: {
        width: '80%',
        alignItems: "center",
        alignSelf: "center",
        marginBottom: 18,
        marginTop: 20,
    }
});
